results.overview: The wildly funny and touching story of a lonely Hawaiian girl and the fugitive alien who helps to mend her broken family.
results.title: Lilo & Stitch

results.overview: As Stitch, a runaway genetic experiment from a faraway planet, wreaks havoc on the Hawaiian Islands, he becomes the mischievous adopted alien \"puppy\" of an independent little girl named Lilo and learns about loyalty, friendship, and ʻohana, the Hawaiian tradition of family.
results.title: Lilo & Stitch

results.original_title: Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch Has a Glitch
results.overview: Now, we find the rowdy extraterrestrial getting used to life with his new ʻohana. However, a malfunction in the ultimate creation of Dr. Jumba soon emerges, which reinstates his destructive programming and threatens to both ruin his friendship with Lilo and to short him out for good!
results.title: Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch Has a Glitch

results.overview: LiLou is a 5th grade school girl who is half Japanese and half Guinean. She is the odd one out in her class, and her classmate, Kokoro is her only friend as they both share the same sense of loneliness. Kokoro never smiles since she became unable to have dreams at night. Lilou makes up her mind to bring dreams and laughter back to her friend and that’s when, Kokoro goes missing. This is the start of Lilou’s adventure that will change her life completely.
results.title: Lilou's Adventure

results.overview: The second instalment in the live-action adaptation franchise. Plot TBA.
results.title: Lilo & Stitch 2

results.overview: Alaa is a successful singer and a womanizer,while Dina is an ambitious rhythmic dancer.  They fall in love when he accidentally kills her dog and they decide to get married,till his ex lover starts chasing him and hires a thug to kill him. His ghost comes to life and starts following his sad bride Dina.
results.title: Wada'an lil'ozobeya

results.overview: In the mid-1990s, the Yuanmingyuan Artist Village dissolved, and artists resettled in Songzhuang's Xiaopu Village in the eastern suburbs of Beijing. The affordable living conditions and relatively free creative environment attracted independent artists from all over China. They arrived with utopian dreams and a thirst for artistic freedom, surviving and creating in the name of art, and developing a unique way of life. Over time, more flocked to the area, leading to the emergence of related industries and small businesses. Streets, shops, taverns, artist studios, and village residences formed a complex network. Over the course of more than a decade, Xiaopu Village transformed from a handful of artists to China's largest art community, with a population of over ten thousand. The cohabitation and interactions with indigenous peoples, local government, and commercial capital, all contributed to Songzhuang's distinctive artistic ecology and made it a microcosm of China's transitional era.
results.title: Lilong Tower

results.original_title: The Story Room: The Making of 'Lilo & Stitch'
results.overview: An in-depth look at the making of Lilo & Stitch (2002).
results.title: The Story Room: The Making of 'Lilo & Stitch'

results.overview: For mysterious reasons, two watchmen are made to guard access to the river in an area of Lausanne where retirees and immigrant families live. Through the different people they encounter, a territory takes shape and a friendship is born. Tizian Büchi creates a fable—part documentary, part fiction and tinged with magical realism—to subtly question our surveillance society.
results.title: Like an Island

results.overview: Lilou is extremely sensitive and curious, but also crippled by an unbearable shyness. She receives the power to see into people's past, which will force her out of her introversion.
results.title: Lilou

results.overview: On a rainy day in Venice, sparks fly when tourist Jacqueline meets the vibrant Emma. After bonding over astrology and Jane Austen, they impulsively decide to spend the day together. Viva la Spontaneità.
results.title: Il Lilo

results.overview: Lilongwe is a story of young woman played by Brenda Mselu who is a professional prostitute and has three children from three different men.\r She has a decent day job but her main cash cow is the married men she sleeps with.\r The climax is when she seduces and falls in love with a foreign married man played by Joab Chakhaza who is in Lilongwe on duty.\r When his wife played by Chavula later comes to visit, hell breaks loose as Lilongwe’s past comes back to haunt her. Throughout the story according to Chavula, Lilongwe is saying, “don’t judge me, you don’t know my story.”
results.title: Lilongwe

results.original_title: Lilos Lachen - Das erstaunliche Leben der Liselotte Pulver
results.overview: A documentary on the occasion of Liselotte Pulver's 90th birthday.
results.title: Lilos Lachen - Das erstaunliche Leben der Liselotte Pulver

results.overview: The movie story comes to life on-screen with words and pictures featuring word-for-word narration, original character voices, and vivid sound effects.
results.title: Lilo & Stitch Read-Along

results.overview: A live-action remake franchise based on the Walt Disney Pictures' \"Lilo & Stitch\" films.
results.title: Lilo & Stitch (Live-Action) Collection

results.overview: The continuing adventures of Lilo, a little Hawaiian girl, and Stitch, the galaxy's most-wanted extraterrestrial. Stitch, Pleakley, and Dr. Jumba are all part of the household now, but what Lilo and Stitch don't know is that Dr. Jumba brought his other alien \"experiments\" to Hawaiʻi as well.
results.title: Stitch! The Movie

results.overview: Lilo, Stitch, Jumba, and Pleakley have finally caught all of Jumba's genetic experiments and found the one true place where each of them belongs. Stitch, Jumba and Pleakley are offered positions in the Galactic Alliance, turning them down so they can stay on Earth with Lilo, but Lilo realizes her alien friends have places where they belong – and it's finally time to say \"aloha\".
results.title: Leroy & Stitch

results.overview: When the Primm family moves to New York City, their young son Josh struggles to adapt to his new school and new friends. All of that changes when he discovers Lyle — a singing crocodile who loves baths, caviar and great music — living in the attic of his new home. But when Lyle’s existence is threatened by evil neighbor Mr. Grumps, the Primms must band together to show the world that family can come from the most unexpected places.
results.title: Lyle, Lyle, Crocodile

results.overview: Alisa Seleznyova and her father professor Seleznyov are traveling in space. They meet their old friend archaeologist Gromozeka, who's just discovered a planet all inhabitants of which died. It became known that they discovered a virus of hostility, got infected and killed each other. Gromozeka also discovered that they had left the virus on Earth 26000 years ago, and the virus is about to become loose. The only chance to save the Earth is to travel 26000 years back in time - to the epoch when witches, dragons and magicians lived along with usual people.
results.title: The Purple Ball
